name: ParaShuuthem Christmas Shock
description:
Again the exciting game ParaShuuthem but with a Christmas theme, also challenges you to survive more than 15 days avoiding the waves of cybernetic paratroopers destroy your base, but if you arrive and begin to destroy your base, do not worry, you will have the opportunity to rebuild it, as well as improve the speed of the cannon and the bullet, but do it wisely since the cost of the improvements will increase each time.

Challenge your friends to see who has the best record, you can win a record of the most days survived, the highest score obtained , but who definitely wins is who gets the best record in days survived with the best score.

ParaShuuthem Christmas Shock is an intuitive, fun and challenging game, you can configure it in 3 languages:

English.

Spanish.

Italian.

Use the Right and Left movement keys to move the cannon from side to side, use the "z" key to shoot.

Select with the mouse the options shown on the screen and do not worry, if you forget what are the keys to play, you will always have an icon with the question mark "?" On the main menu. that will show you the keys that are used to play.
